page.title: 19FLASH FLOODS
page.content: Wednesday June 12 1985 __________________________ In one half hour this evening around 4 p.m.one and a half inches of rain fell on Maldon causing flash floods.There was much flooding in the town itself- factories,houses and schools were feet under water.Because Maldon is on a hill water gushed from the higher area to low lying areas cutting off roads to surrounding villages.Most of the traffic was at a standstill.Fire brig- ades from nearby towns helped with mopping up. Our own school St Francis was affec- ted-the road and path was two feet under water but no water entered the building.Now,however,a month later the beautiful parquet flooring in the hall has lifted up.This is probably due to the water not draining away properly.
